description: Notice of permitted development of telecommunications apparatus comprising: Proposed EE 1No. GPS Unit at 23.1m AGL to be fixed to existing Support Pole. Proposed EE 1No. Airi Cabinet to be installed within Cabin 1 EE. Proposed EE 7No. ERS to be installed. Proposed EE 7No. Mk2 BOB to be installed. Proposed EE 7No. MHA's to be installed. Proposed EE 4No. 18/26 Diplexers to be installed. Proposed EE 6No. RD0759 Combiners to be installed. Proposed EE 2No. AVA5-50 Feeders, 3No. Multimode Trunk, 1No. Single Mode Trunk & 1No. DC Trunk to be installed. Existing Feeder Management to be utilised.H3G & EE 22No. LCF5-50 Feeders to be re-used and cut off if needed.EE 1No. GPS Unit at 22.8m to be removed. EE 1No. BTS3900L and EE 1No. IMB05 to be removed.EE 4No. RRUs to be removed. EE 4No. MK1 BOBs to be removed. EE 4No. MHAs to be removed. EE 2No.Hybrid Trunk to be removed and associated ancillary works
